pages.title: Dark Oak Planks!
pages.text: Gathering $(#FFA500)Dark Oak Planks $()is simple! This is the 6th capability that you will unlock! $(br2)Item Given: Dark Oak Planks

pages.name: Capability Level 500
pages.text: At $(#FFA500)level 500$(), you will be able to immediately gather $(#FFA500)Dark Oak Planks$()
